analysis.title: Global Market Outlook
analysis.content: GMS score 36 indicates a Defensive regime. Downward momentum pushed the score to 36, driven by a rising VIX (Fear/Volatility) and widening credit spreads. While Gold and Crypto show resilience, the risk-off trend prevails globally. Monitor the High-Yield (HY) spread variance for signs of deepening systemic stress; maintain a cautious stance until volatility stabilizes and liquidity conditions improve.

reports.EN: GMS score 36 indicates a Defensive regime. Downward momentum pushed the score to 36, driven by a rising VIX (Fear/Volatility) and widening credit spreads. While Gold and Crypto show resilience, the risk-off trend prevails globally. Monitor the High-Yield (HY) spread variance for signs of deepening systemic stress; maintain a cautious stance until volatility stabilizes and liquidity conditions improve.

Vigile la varianza del spread de alto rendimiento (HY) ante seÃ±ales de mayor estrÃ©s sistÃ©mico antes de aumentar la exposiciÃ³n.

reports.ID: Skor GMS 36 menunjukkan rezim Defensif. Momentum mendorong skor ke 36, dipicu oleh kenaikan VIX (Ketakutan/Volatilitas) dan pelebaran spread kredit. Meskipun Emas dan Kripto menunjukkan ketahanan, tren penghindaran risiko tetap mendominasi secara global. Pantau varians spread High-Yield (HY) untuk tanda-tanda tekanan sistemik yang mendalam sebelum menambah eksposur pada aset berisiko.

reports.FR: Le score GMS de 36 indique un rÃ©gime dÃ©fensif. L'Ã©lan a poussÃ© le score Ã  36, sous l'effet d'une hausse du VIX (peur/volatilitÃ©) et de l'Ã©largissement des spreads de crÃ©dit.
